docs.title: About this site
docs.text:
This site is a collection of how-tos and best practices about Asterisk IP-PBX and related software from the perspective of a system administrator with 10+ years of experience.

The site is generated from markdown files under litnialex/asteriskguru repository using MkDocs and hosted on GitHub Pages.

You can contact me via email: litnialex@gmail.com

docs.title: Saltstack
docs.text:
This method describes using Saltstack formula asterisk-formula to install Asterisk.

We will use salt-call command, a standalone saltstack minion process to process asterisk-formula and install asterisk.

pip3 install salt
git clone https://github.com/litnialex/asterisk-formula.git
salt-call -l info --local --file-root=asterisk-formula/ state.apply asterisk
